title: (Help pls) Playin' Dark Souls II, scrolling through iFunny on my iPod between duels...
body:
Get done with a duel and check my iPod again, screen won't come on. Hold the power button, the "Dead pls charge" icon doesn't show up. 

Plugged it in for about an hour, still won't come on. Plugged it into my PC and it's not being recognized...

Is my iPod RIP?
